root.title: ccc accept bonu bid ON wheat flour TO iraq
root.body: the commod credit corpor ccc accept bid export bonus cover sale 25,000 tonn wheat flour iraq u. agricultur depart say the depart say bonus award averag 116.84 dlr per tonn the shipment period march 15-april 20 12,500 tonn april 5 12,500 tonn the bonu award make peavey compani paid form commod ccc stock say An addit 175,000 tonn wheat flour still avail iraq export enhanc program init announc januari 7 1987 depart say
